creator: carnold@houston.rr.com
text:
When DOMConfigurator was changed to a compatibility layer on top of
JoranConfigurator, the DOMConfigurator.doConfigure(Element) and
DOMConfigurator.configure(Element) methods were not provided.  These methods
were used by Excalibur-logging.

I have reimplemented these methods by providing a ParseAction that fires off the
SAX events that correspond with the DOM element.
Changes committed and excalibur Gump descriptor changed away from log4j 1.2.
creator: carnold@houston.rr.com
